com.spotify.flo

Interface EvalContext.Promise<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the promised value
    Enclosing interface:
    EvalContext

    public static interface EvalContext.Promise<T>
    A promise for a EvalContext.Value that is supposed to be set(Object).

    This is supposed to be used where the processing for producing a value happens in a different environment but is needed by values produced in this context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fail(Throwable throwable)
      Fail the promise.
      void set(T value)
      Fulfill the promise.
      EvalContext.Value<T> value()
      The value for this promise.

    • Method Detail

      • value

        EvalContext.Value<T> value()
        The value for this promise. When this promise is fulfilled, the value will become available.
        Returns:
        The value corresponding to this promise

      • set

        void set(T value)
        Fulfill the promise.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to fulfill the promise with
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the promise was already fulfilled

      • fail

        void fail(Throwable throwable)
        Fail the promise.
        Parameters:
        throwable - The exception that is the cause of the failure
